glsa.title: Asterisk: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Asterisk could allow a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Asterisk is an open source telephony engine and toolkit.

description.p: A vulnerability has been found in Asterisk's handling of certain encrypted streams where the res_srtp module has been loaded but video support has not been enabled.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted SDP message to the Asterisk daemon, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Asterisk users should upgrade to the latest version:
